attributes.action: stop the discriminative policy of  prosecuting offenders  caught by speed cameras only if the the offence was commited in a u.k registered vehicle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The police do not send out "intent of prosecution" notices to drivers of foreign registered vehicles caught speeding by static "safety" cameras.
(sourced using freedom of information act). This selective law enforcment is a clear infringment of human rights and is prejudicial against the drivers of u.k registered vehicles,of which, the vast majority are British.either stop and recind all prosecutions or prosecute all offenders. "cake and eat it" comes to mind.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
